title: Voyage
imageCaption: creative direction / brand experience / visual identity / ui / ux / design
description: A Digitally Native Brand Experience that makes vacation planning fun & easy
richtext:
A VACATION RESEARCH EXPERIENCE THAT ALLOWS THE TRAVELER TO QUICKLY COMPARE & CONTRAST GLOBAL DESTINATIONS. THIS EXPERIENCE MAKES IT EASY TO EXPLORE THE HIGHLIGHTS FRoM EACH CITY, AND BOOK TRAVEL BASED ON THEIR PREFERENCES.
